name: Seafood
description: Enjoy the flavors of the sea with dishes featuring shrimp, fish, squid, and more. Perfect for light and elegant meals.

name: Lamb
description: Delicious and aromatic lamb recipes, ideal for special occasions or when you want something hearty and rich.

name: Starter
description: Appetizers and small bites to whet your appetite before the main course.

name: Chicken
description: Versatile and juicy chicken recipes for every occasion, from simple dinners to exotic creations.

name: Beef
description: Hearty and satisfying beef dishes—stir-fried, grilled, roasted, or stewed.

name: Dessert
description: End your meal on a sweet note with cakes, cookies, puddings, and other delightful desserts.

name: Vegan
description: Plant-based recipes made without any animal products—healthy, ethical, and full of flavor.

name: Pork
description: Flavorful recipes featuring pork—great for roasts, stir-fries, and comfort food classics.

name: Vegetarian
description: Tasty and filling recipes without meat, ideal for vegetarians or meat-free days.

name: Miscellaneous
description: Unique and creative recipes that don't fit into specific categories—perfect for exploration.

name: Pasta
description: Classic and modern pasta recipes from around the world—rich, creamy, spicy, or simple.

name: Breakfast
description: Start your day right with energizing breakfast ideas—omelets, porridge, pancakes, and more.

name: Side
description: Delicious side dishes to complement your main meal—vegetables, grains, and beyond.

name: Goat
description: Distinctive recipes made with goat meat, often used in traditional or festive cuisine.

name: Soup
description: Warm up with soups of all kinds—from broths to creamy blends, perfect year-round.
